dublin_core.dcvalue: Digital pathology includes the information technology that allows for the management of information including data and images generated in an anatomic pathology department COST ACTION IC0604 The integration of digital slides in the electronic health record is one of the main objectives of COST Action IC0604 Telepathology Network in Europe EURO TELEPATH Fostering use of medical informatics standards and adapting them to current needs is needed to manage efficiently extremely large medical images like digital slide files
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-10T17:51:27Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2011-04-14
COST Action "EuroTelepath": digital pathology integration in electronic health record, including primary care centres.
